root.name: Scurge: Hive
root.description: ReceptionThe GBA version of Scurge: Hive was well received, with critics citing its graphics and intense combat as strengths. While the DS version was practically identical to the GBA release, it was reviewed less favorably because it didn't take advantage of the touchscreen or increased graphical power of the DS.
